name: Arcanist

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally DEF in the Arena by 25%.

skills.name: Paralyzing Touch
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 20% chance of placing a [Sleep] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 7 Damage +10%

skills.name: Unnatural Recovery
skills.raw_description:
Places a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Vigor
skills.raw_description:
Places a 25% [Increase ATK] buff and a 15% [Increase C. RATE] buff on all allies for 3 turns.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
